attributes.action: put a ban of software companies saying their programs are free, when in fact, when you have installed them, certain programs say it's a Trial version
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks that it is really silly that software says it's free, but certain programs after you have installed them say it is not a free program, it is a trial version?

Who thinks companies should stop saying the programs are free and just be honest so people know if they want to install them or not and not mess up their computer / settings?
